data.title: LWPC: Long Wavelength Propagation Capability
data.name: LWPC
data.description: Version 2.1 of the U.S. Navy Long Wave Propagation Capability code with alterations for running as a MATLAB function. The altered version has most warning and error reporting removed.

evidence: "The Long Wavelength Propagation Capability (LWPC) code was original programmed for Windows... the code was ported over using gfortran" (describes a standalone codebase users run).
"Two simple steps are needed to get LWPC running: ... Run BuildLWPC.cmd ... To run LWPC type ./LWPC [input file name]" (end-user executes program directly).

README only describes cloning/building and running via ./LWPC with build scripts (BuildLWPC.cmd), with no mention of package managers, containers, or hosted services, implying source-based distribution.
